verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> of David; <WH1732> A Prayer <WH8605> when he was <WH1961> in the cave. <WH4631> I cried <WH2199> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> with my voice; <WH6963> with my voice <WH6963> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> did I make my supplication. <WH2603>
I poured out <WH8210> my complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> him; I showed <WH5046> before <WH6440> him my trouble. <WH6869>

When my spirit <WH7307> was overwhelmed <WH5848> within <WH5921> me, then thou <WH859> knewest <WH3045> my path. <WH5410> In the way <WH734> wherein <WH2098> I walked <WH1980> have they privily laid <WH2934> a snare <WH6341> for me.

I looked <WH5027> on my right hand, <WH3225> and beheld, <WH7200> but there was no man <WH369> that would know <WH5234> me: refuge <WH4498> failed <WH6> <WH4480> me; no man <WH369> cared <WH1875> for my soul. <WH5315>
I cried <WH2199> unto <WH413> thee, O LORD: <WH3068> I said, <WH559> Thou <WH859> art my refuge <WH4268> and my portion <WH2506> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

Attend <WH7181> unto <WH413> my cry; <WH7440> for <WH3588> I am brought very low: <WH1809> <WH3966> deliver <WH5337> me from my persecutors; <WH4480> <WH7291> for <WH3588> they are stronger <WH553> than <WH4480> I.

Bring my soul out <WH3318> <WH5315> of prison, <WH4480> <WH4525> that I may praise <WH3034> <WH853> thy name: <WH8034> the righteous <WH6662> shall compass me about; <WH3803> for <WH3588> thou shalt deal bountifully <WH1580> with <WH5921> me.
